20101230010048.000|20101230010049.000|CC1|MEANS PEOPLE WILL BE HEADED TO

20101230010135.000|20101230010139.000|CC1|ON HIGHWAY 38 FOR SEVERAL MILES 
20101230010139.000|20101230010142.000|CC1|TODAY, FOR SEVERAL HOURS TODAY. 
20101230010142.000|20101230010145.000|CC1|DRIVER HOLLY CARNEY EXPLAINS    
20101230010145.000|20101230010146.000|CC1|WHY.                            
20101230010146.000|20101230010146.000|CC1|>> UNFORTUNATELY BECAUSE THERE  
20101230010146.000|20101230010148.000|CC1|WAS A CAR ACCIDENT UP THERE WE  
20101230010148.000|20101230010151.000|CC1|HAD TO GO BUMPER-TO-BUMPER VERY

20101230010549.000|20101230010551.000|CC1|TAKE A LOOK AT THE AQUEDUCT     
20101230010551.000|20101230010553.000|CC1|DROUGHT IS PROBABLY THE LAST    
20101230010553.000|20101230010554.000|CC1|THING THAT COMES TO MIND, BUT   
20101230010554.000|20101230010555.000|CC1|THOSE WHO ARE TRACK ALL OF THE  
20101230010555.000|20101230010556.000|CC1|RAIN AND SNOW WE'VE HAD IN THE

20101230010558.000|20101230010600.000|CC1|TOO SOON TO TELL IF WE'LL HAVE A
20101230010600.000|20101230010602.000|CC1|WETTER THAN AVERAGE WINTER.     
20101230010602.000|20101230010604.000|CC1|IN THE SIERRA NEVADAS THE SNOW  
20101230010604.000|20101230010606.000|CC1|PACK IS PROVIDING CAUTIOUS      
20101230010606.000|20101230010607.000|CC1|OPTIMISM.                       
20101230010607.000|20101230010608.000|CC1|THE DEPARTMENT OF WATER         
20101230010608.000|20101230010611.000|CC1|RESOURCES SAYS THE WATER CONTENT
20101230010611.000|20101230010613.000|CC1|IS 198% OF NORMAL FOR THIS TIME 
20101230010613.000|20101230010616.000|CC1|OF YEAR COMPARED TO JUST 85%    
20101230010616.000|20101230010617.000|CC1|LAST YEAR.                      
20101230010617.000|20101230010618.000|CC1|>> SO EVEN THOUGH WE ARE        
20101230010618.000|20101230010621.000|CC1|STARTING OUT WITH A PRETTY      
20101230010621.000|20101230010623.000|CC1|PHENOMENAL SNOW PACK, COME      
20101230010623.000|20101230010624.000|CC1|APRIL 1st IT MAY NOT BE SO      
20101230010624.000|20101230010625.000|CC1|GOOD.                           
20101230010625.000|20101230010626.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HERE IN SOUTHERN   
20101230010626.000|20101230010627.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA THIS IS THE SECOND   
20101230010627.000|20101230010628.000|CC1|WETTEST DECEMBER ON RECORD FOR  
20101230010628.000|20101230010631.000|CC1|LOS ANGELES.                    
20101230010631.000|20101230010633.000|CC1|BUT CLIMATE EXPERTS SAY THAT    
20101230010633.000|20101230010635.000|CC1|DOESN'T MEAN A WET WINTER IS ON 
20101230010635.000|20101230010635.000|CC1|TAP.                            
20101230010635.000|20101230010639.000|CC1|18 OF THE LAST 29 LA NINAS HAVE 
20101230010639.000|20101230010641.000|CC1|BROUGHT NORMAL WATERFALL        
20101230010641.000|20101230010642.000|CC1|AMOUNTS.                        
20101230010642.000|20101230010643.000|CC1|BUT THEY ARE HOPEFUL.           
20101230010643.000|20101230010645.000|CC1|>> WE ARE CAUTIOUSLY OPTIMISTIC 
20101230010645.000|20101230010646.000|CC1|ABOUT THE FACT THAT THIS HAS    
20101230010646.000|20101230010648.000|CC1|GIVEN US AN OPPORTUNITY WITH THE
20101230010648.000|20101230010650.000|CC1|RECENT RAIN STORMS AND SNOW PACK
20101230010650.000|20101230010653.000|CC1|TO FILL SOME OF OUR STORAGE     
20101230010653.000|20101230010654.000|CC1|RESERVES.                       
20101230010654.000|20101230010655.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DEBORAH MANN SAYS  
20101230010655.000|20101230010657.000|CC1|DIAMOND VALLEY LAKE, FOR EXAMPLE
20101230010657.000|20101230010658.000|CC1|WAS LESS THAN HALF FULL SIX     
20101230010658.000|20101230010700.000|CC1|MONTHS AGO, NOW IT'S 80% FULL.  
20101230010700.000|20101230010703.000|CC1|BUT SHE SAYS WE STILL HAVE A    
20101230010703.000|20101230010704.000|CC1|TEN-YEAR DROUGHT FROM THE       
20101230010704.000|20101230010705.000|CC1|COLORADO RIVER AND A FEDERAL    
20101230010705.000|20101230010708.000|CC1|ORDER TO SAVE AN ENDANGERED FISH
20101230010708.000|20101230010709.000|CC1|LIMITS HOW MUCH WATER CAN BE

20101230013133.000|20101230013135.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS NOTHING SALVAGEABLE
20101230013135.000|20101230013137.000|CC1|IN THE HOUSE, IT WAS A TOTAL    
20101230013137.000|20101230013137.000|CC1|LOSS.
